body: On a plane with this trait, objects remain where they are (and what they are) unless affected by physical force or magic. You can change the immediate environment as a result of tangible effort. Unless otherwise noted in a plane's description, assume it has the alterable morphic trait.
url: pfsrd://Game Mastery Guide/Rules/Planar Adventures/Planar Traits/Morphic Traits/Alterable Morphic
name: Alterable Morphic
